text: Te divase dhongi purusa ane stri imanavala'one kahese ke amari pratiksa to karo, ke ame pana tamara prakasathi kami prakasa melavi la'i'e, javaba apavamam avase ke tame potani pachala phari java ane prakasa sodho, pachi te banneni vacce eka divala kari devamam avase, jemam baranum pana hase, tena andarana bhagamam ananda hase ane baharana bhagamam yatana hase
